As BLACKARACHNIA pressed foward she could see the entrance to the ARK.
It appeared to wide open. The two guards: NIGHTSHIFT and WOLFGANG
appeared to be, at least temporarily, distracted with something else.

There were other MAXIMALS as well, but most of them seemed to be
packing another ship or were generally going about the business of
trying to make repairs or modifications to the ARK.

As BLACKARACHNIA stepped across the threshold, she might even be able
to 'feel' the sensor net close about her. At the moment though, her
cloak was holding it at bay. It wouldn't do it for ever, but it was
still holding. A single mistep would be a dangerous one though.

Inside was the main hall of the ARK. Behind her was the way out, ahead
of her was the direction of the command center. Between her and that
stood another problem.

It was here that the loading of the second ship was being done. LEO
PRIME as well as NOCTORRO were moving things back and forth and
directing others as well.

It would not be easy to get passed them, especially if NIGHTSHIFT and
WOLFGANG started nosing about more.

(OOC: Feel free to bounce off each other if you like)

(TAG)

- Preston
